short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See how future assignments will impact your total grade for a class. Only for students attending BCA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Better BCA GPAâ„¢ adds several useful features to PowerSchool.

This current version, the following features are available:
- You can add imaginary grades, and see how your final grade for a class would change.
- You can see accurate point values for all your class grades, down to the 4th decimal place
- Stylizes the Powerschool page to look better

All features work for all classes, including classes using category weighting.
